**Bookmark**: Instead of a traditional bookmark, use a hair clip to mark your place in a book. The clip can easily slide onto the page, and you can even use multiple clips to mark different sections or chapters.

**Picture Hanger**: Hair clips can serve as mini picture hangers for lightweight art or photos. Attach the clip to the top edge of the picture and then use a thumbtack or pushpin to hang it on the wall. This adds a unique touch to your decor.

**Bag Closure**: If you have an open bag of snacks or other items, use a hair clip to seal it shut. This will keep the contents fresh and prevent spills. It’s a simple and effective alternative to traditional bag clips.
**Zipper Pull**: If the pull tab on your zipper breaks, you can use a hair clip as a temporary replacement. Simply attach the clip to the zipper slider to make it easier to pull up and down.
**Art Supply Holder**: Use hair clips to hold together paintbrushes, pens, or markers. This keeps your art supplies organized and prevents them from rolling away when you’re working on a project.
